cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.MM, cs.DC, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the design of a broadcast system to maximize throughput, which is a problem related to information theory (cs.IT). The system is a communication system, which involves networking and communication (cs.NI). The paper also mentions the use of modulation techniques, which is a topic in multimedia (cs.MM). The proposed scheme involves combining time sharing and hierarchical modulation, which requires optimization and control (cs.DC). Finally, the paper applies the proposed scheme to the DVB-SH standard, which is a system-level topic (cs.SY).
